Javascript

Ifâ€¦ Else

there is no elseif keyword in JS. so for example code below represents the if else if block, but in reality this is not how it might seem to work.

if (condition1)
   statement1
else if (condition2)
   statement2
else if (condition3)
   statement3
...
else
   statementN

so above code will evaluate to ( with right indentation )

if (condition1)
   statement1
else
   if (condition2)
      statement2
   else
      if (condition3)
...
